TextView.android:text: Address: Estrada da Baia de Nossa Senhora da Esperanca, Macau

Set on Macau's Cotai Strip, this Vegas-style, Venice-themed luxury resort and casino lies 3 km from Taipa island and 8 km from Macau Tower Convention and Entertainment Centre. Classic Italian-style suites include sunken living room areas and marble bathrooms with separate tubs and showers. They also feature free Wi-Fi, tea and coffeemaking facilities, and flat-screen TVs with cable channels and movies on demand. Varied dining options include Japanese, Italian and Indian fine dining, as well as a food court. There's an extensive shopping mall, glitzy live shows and 4 outdoor pools. Gondola rides through the resort's canals are also available.
